name: WTC: Love's Labour's Lost
summary: The Violet Hotel's waitress and local tour guide are determined to foil the protagonist's plans to take Grendel back to America. Unfortunately, neither native is prepared for the cost of doing so

name: WTF? Story
summary: WTF? Story is a Cave Story mod made by GIRakaCHEEZER. This mod has been a high landmark for the Cave Story modding community. For it's time, WTF? Story was applauded for it's large variety of assembly hacking edits, TSC manipulations, and fun/wacky themes.

name: WTF Am I Playing?!
summary:
WTF AM I PLAYING?! is a first-person shooter with elements of platforming, puzzles, and experimental comedy. It blends fast-paced action with unexpected scenarios, minimal guidance, and surreal humor.

Gameplay & Features:
-Uniquely designed levels with their own mechanics.
-First-person shooter gameplay with puzzle and platforming elements.
-Stylized retro graphics and effects.
-Unique enemies: angry chickens, mutant burgers, giant gorillas, and more.
-Dynamic soundtrack and sound design tailored to each level’s tone.
-No loading screens between core sequences — just smooth, weird transitions.
-Short session-friendly level structure. (15–20 minutes per level.)
-Main content offers around 2–3 hours of gameplay.

And yes — you’ll keep wondering what’s going on, and why you’re enjoying it.

Perfect for players who enjoy:
-Unconventional, unpredictable gameplay.
-Retro-inspired visuals and effects that evoke classic gaming nostalgia.
-Fast-paced FPS action with a twist of humor and unexpected challenges.
-Players with no expectations.

name: W.T.
summary: "Perfect" is possible only for those who know mathematics. When you open your eyes, you are alone in a white room. In a mansion dominated by the mysteries of numbers. Solve the presented math puzzles and aim for the exit.

name: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [SxS]
summary: Grendel and her "friend" must work together to find a way out of a strange school, where pupils and teachers alike are being killed

name: WTF
summary: WTF is a chaotic first person shooter that confronts heavily armed players with "The Devil" himself.

name: WTF: Waifu Tactical Force
summary: WTF is an anime movement shooter where every PvP win fuels your long-term progression towards the ultimate mercenary army. Victories earn XP and currency to upgrade your waifu-run Mother Base, unlocking perks & rare waifus you bring back into combat. Assign non-playable waifus to buildings for resources, deploy them on missions, and expand your tactical options. Each system feeds the next: shoot to build, build to upgrade, upgrade to dominate. Wrapped in a visual novel framework, it’s a genre hybrid where management, skill, and waifus drive everything.

name: WTF: Work Time Fun
summary: Created specifically for the PSP system, WTF is a crazy collection of fun and addictive mini-games that drive the player to perform sometimes trivial, sometimes mind-bending, but always fun jobs in pursuit of the almighty dollar. The latest in a long line of unique Japanese games that have gained popularity in the United States, WTF delivers gamers compelling, bite-sized morsels of frenzied arcade-style action unlike anything ever seen on the PSP system.

name: WtBoy
summary: A little game about a little man who needs to get out of a big terrible place.

name: WTP Story 1
summary: WTP - Story 1 is a dynamic choice lead adventure.

name: WTF Is Wrong With You?
summary: Have you ever wondered WTF Is Wrong With You? Well, so have we... Let's find out together, shall we?

name: Wteruna
summary: A turn-based game, role-playing. Through the role-playing way to deduce a depraved love and hatred of morality or humanity.

name: W. T. B.
summary: This is a branded anniversary clicker!

name: WTF Do You Know?
summary: We just have one question for you... "WTF Do You Know?" I think it might be time for us to find out...

name: WTA Tour Tennis
summary: This is a Konami game with the license of the official WTA Tour. Featuring many of the world's most famous female tennis players, it is one of the underdogs of the Game Boy Advance handheld console.

name: WTC: Recruitment Day
summary: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

name: WTA Tour Tennis
summary: Use the amazing combo of moves provided to outwit the world's great female players. Also, this game features different court surfaces, which also affect the bounce and spin of the ball. Singles and Double friendlies can be played against any of the WTA stars. Four major tournaments are offered, success in which will see the player rising through the WTA ranks.
